frame.name: Place_weight_on
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> who is engaged in an <fen>Undertaking</fen> accords a <fen>Degree</fen> of importance to a <fen>Consideration</fen> that influences the success of an <fen>Undertaking</fen>. As a consequence, the <fen>Agent</fen> acts in a way that reflects that judgment of importance.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Our company</fex> <t>emphasizes</t> <fex name="Consideration">marketing tried and true products and services</fex>.<fex name="Competing_consideration">INI</fex></ex>
<ex>In fact, <fex name="Agent">most search engines</fex> <t>place</t> <fex name="Degree">little</fex> <t>weight</t> <fex name="Consideration">on words placed in meta tags</fex> <fex name="Undertaking">when creating their relevancy rankings</fex>.<fex name="Competing_consideration">INI</fex></ex>
<ex>The <t>emphasis</t> <m>is</m> <fex name="Consideration">on the fundamental principles from which the automotive technologies of the future will develop</fex>, <fex name="Competing_consideration">rather than on present-day processes</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">Our</fex> <t>emphasis</t> <fex name="Consideration">on quality</fex> does not stop with our products. <fex name="Competing_consideration">INI</fex></ex>
<ex><fex name="Undertaking">When shooting in my studio</fex>, <fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>emphasize</t> <fex name="Consideration">a relaxed atmosphere</fex>.<fex name="Competing_consideration">INI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Consideration
FE.definition:
<def-root>An event or state of affairs, an attribute, or an entity whose properties have the potential to influence the success of the <fen>Agent</fen>'s <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
<ex>The ICBL has <t>prioritised</t> <fex name="con">working to achieve universalisation of the Mine Ban Treaty in South Asia by 2004</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE marks expressions that indicate the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Consideration</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Undertaking
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Undertaking</fen> is a process or state or field of activity in which the <fen>Agent</fen> participates.
<ex><fex name="Undertaking">In my classes</fex> I <m>place</m> greater <t>emphasis</t> on the importance of staying relaxed and being aware of one's physical limits rather than exactness of form.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Reason
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Reason</fen> for which the <fen>Consideration</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is the individual who devotes time, concentration, or other resources to a <fen>Consideration</fen> that is important for the success of a larger <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
<ex>Dell said Friday <fex name="age">the company</fex> will put more <t>emphasis</t> on selling software</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>An action that the <fen>Agent</fen> intends to accomplish by assigning the specified level of importance to the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
<ex>Wilson said it is necessary to <t>place</t> less <t>weight</t> on SAT scores <fex name="pur">in order to maintain diversity</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An intentional action performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that allows the <fen>Agent</fen> to respond to the importance of the Factor to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Competing_consideration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Competing_consideration</fen> is another factor that is relevant to the <fen>Undertaking</fen> to which the <fen>Agent</fen> devotes less attention or effort.
<ex>Monophysite Christians <t>emphasized</t> Christ's divinity <fex name="com">over his humanity</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time period during which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches a specified degree of importance to the <fen>Consideration</fen> to further the success of the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Time">In the 1960s</fex> Foucault <t>placed</t> great <t>weight</t> on the notion of archeology.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location in which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches the specified level of importance to the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
<ex><fex name="pla">In Arizona</fex> we <t>emphasize</t> western bats with a special focus on species identification.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any further description of the <fen>Agent</fen>'s placing of importance on the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
<ex>Our teacher always <m>places</m> <fex name="man">vigorous</fex> <t>emphasis</t> on controlling our spiritual energy.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Artifact
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Artifact</fen> is a physical object designed with some <fen>Consideration</fen> in mind, such that it functions to facilitate the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
<ex>Water is a scarce commodity on French Island so <fex name="art">the guest house</fex> places strong <t>emphasis</t> on water conservation.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Action
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Action</fen> is performed with importance placed on the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
<ex>Result <t>Oriented</t> <fex name="act">Management</fex></ex> <ex><fex name="act">UN efforts</fex> <t>focused</t> on the rehabilitation and economic development of south Lebanon</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element is defined as the number of times an event occurs per some unit of time. A Frequency expression answers the question how often. It is to be distinguished from Iteration, which pertains simply to the number of times an event occurs-Iteration expressions answer the question how many times. In the future, we will further distinguish Particular_iteration, which is intended to pick out a particular iteration from a series. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: emphasize.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: devote relatively more attention and effort to

lexUnit.name: prioritize.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: designate or treat as most important.

lexUnit.name: emphasis.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: special importance, value, or prominence given to something.

lexUnit.name: centered.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: taking a specified subject as the most important element

lexUnit.name: focused.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: directed towards or placing importance on a particular subject.

lexUnit.name: oriented.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: specifically designed for or placing particular attention on a subject.

lexUnit.name: growth-oriented.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: specifically designed for or placing particular attention on economic growth.
